code: Definition inf_decidable {X} (P : X -> Prop) : Type := { f : X -> bool | decider f P}.
Definition inf_enumerable {X} (P : X -> Prop) : Type := { f : nat -> option X | enumerator f P}.
Definition inf_semi_decidable {X} (P : X -> Prop) : Type := { f : X -> nat -> bool | semi_decider f P}.
Definition inf_reduces {X Y} (P : X -> Prop) (Q : Y -> Prop) := { f : X -> Y | reduction f P Q}.
